name: Solitaire by MobilityWare
summary:
We’ve made some incredible NEW FEATURES to Solitaire:

DAILY CHALLENGE CALENDAR THEMES
Each month of the year has a unique theme to spotlight. Take a look at your Daily Challenge calendar for a fun new theme each month!

MODERN CARD FACES
Solitaire has a fresh card face style, without sacrificing the classic look and features that our fans enjoy!

This Solitaire game features DAILY CHALLENGES. Each day you’ll receive a unique Daily Challenge. Solve the Daily Challenge and receive a crown for that day. Earn trophies each month by winning more crowns! Your Daily Challenges, crowns, and current trophy status are available to view any time

How great are your Solitaire skills? With LEADERBOARDS, you can compete for the best Solitaire score against players all around the world.

Solitaire is a universal app, playable in the highest quality available for each Apple device. 

= FEATURES = 
•	Ad-Free Gameplay
•	Daily Challenges
•	Themed Card Backs and Backgrounds
•	iMessage Stickers
•	Multiplayer Solitaire
•	"Show Me How To Win" for difficult deals
•	Leaderboards
•	3D Touch in phone menu
•	Draw 1 and Draw 3 cards
•	Portrait and Landscape orientations
•	Customized card backs and backgrounds
•	Achievements
•	Right or left handed play
•	Unlimited Undo
•	Auto Complete to finish game
•	Standard and Vegas Scoring
•	Statistics
•	Accessibility Settings

The addicting game you’ve been playing on your computer for years now goes wherever you go. Download Solitaire today!

LIKE US on Facebook
http://www.facebook.com/mobilitywaresolitaire

For the latest info and what we are up to, check out
http://www.MobilityWare.com/

Created and supported by MobilityWare
